Module com.boslott
Package com.boslott.DataAccess

Class UCertdbAppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
com.boslott.DataAccess.UCertdbAppointmentDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentDAO
public class UCertdbAppointmentDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppointmentDAO
A UCertdbAppointmentDAO object is an Appointment Data Access Object used to interact with Appointment data from a UCertify database
Author:
Steven Slott

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    UCertdbAppointmentDAO()
    Constructs an UCertdbAppointmentDAO object and gets a connection to the UCertify database data source

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean deleteAllAppointmentsOfCustomer​(int customerID)
    Deletes all of the Appointment entries from the UCertify database that are related to the Customer with the customerID of the given customerID
    java.lang.Boolean deleteAppointment​(int apptID)
    Deletes a single Appointment entry with the appointmentID of apptID from the UCertify database
    java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> findAllAppointments​(java.lang.Boolean refetch)
    Gets all Appointment data from the local ArrayList of Appointment objects or calls the private class method to get data from the UCertify database.
    java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> findAllCustomerAppointments​(java.lang.String customerName)
    Gets all Appointment data from the UCertify database related to one Customer entry with the customerName property value of the given customerName String
    java.lang.Boolean insertAppointment​(Appointment newAppt)
    Inserts a new Appointment entry into the UCertify database with the data contained in the newAppt object
    java.lang.Boolean updateAppointment​(Appointment apptToUpdate)
    Updates an Appointment entry in the UCertify database with the property values contained in the apptToUpdate object

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • UCertdbAppointmentDAO

      public UCertdbAppointmentDAO() throws java.sql.SQLException
      Constructs an UCertdbAppointmentDAO object and gets a connection to the UCertify database data source
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there is a database access error

  • Method Details

    • findAllAppointments

      public java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> findAllAppointments​(java.lang.Boolean refetch)
      Gets all Appointment data from the local ArrayList of Appointment objects or calls the private class method to get data from the UCertify database. If refetch is true or if the local ArrayList of Appointment objects is null, the method calls to the UCertdb again. If retch is false, the method returns the locally cached results.
      Specified by:
      findAllAppointments in interface AppointmentDAO
      Parameters:
      refetch - whether to call to the UCertdb again or not
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all Appointment objects

    • findAllCustomerAppointments

      public java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> findAllCustomerAppointments​(java.lang.String customerName)
      Gets all Appointment data from the UCertify database related to one Customer entry with the customerName property value of the given customerName String
      Specified by:
      findAllCustomerAppointments in interface AppointmentDAO
      Parameters:
      customerName - the customerName value of the customerName property of the Customer entry to search the UCertify database for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all Appointment objects related to one Customer entry with the customerName property value of the given customerName String

    • insertAppointment

      public java.lang.Boolean insertAppointment​(Appointment newAppt)
      Inserts a new Appointment entry into the UCertify database with the data contained in the newAppt object
      Specified by:
      insertAppointment in interface AppointmentDAO
      Parameters:
      newAppt - the object containing the property values (except the appointmentID) of the new Appointment entry being inserted into the UCertdb
      Returns:
      true if the insert successfully completes, false if the insert does not successfully complete

    • updateAppointment

      public java.lang.Boolean updateAppointment​(Appointment apptToUpdate)
      Updates an Appointment entry in the UCertify database with the property values contained in the apptToUpdate object
      Specified by:
      updateAppointment in interface AppointmentDAO
      Parameters:
      apptToUpdate - the object containing all of the property values to update the Appointment entry, including the appointmentID of the Appointment entry to update
      Returns:
      true if the update successfully completes, false if the update does not successfully complete

    • deleteAppointment

      public java.lang.Boolean deleteAppointment​(int apptID)
      Deletes a single Appointment entry with the appointmentID of apptID from the UCertify database
      Specified by:
      deleteAppointment in interface AppointmentDAO
      Parameters:
      apptID - the appointmentID of the Appointment entry to delete from the UCertify database
      Returns:
      true if the deletion successfully completes, false if the deletion does not successfully complete

    • deleteAllAppointmentsOfCustomer

      public java.lang.Boolean deleteAllAppointmentsOfCustomer​(int customerID)
      Deletes all of the Appointment entries from the UCertify database that are related to the Customer with the customerID of the given customerID
      Specified by:
      deleteAllAppointmentsOfCustomer in interface AppointmentDAO
      Parameters:
      customerID - the customerID of the Customer entry in the UCertify database to search for related Appointment entries
      Returns:
      true if the deletion successfully completes, false if the deletion does not successfully complete
